text: apa wisin nagiya yuthu prashnayak wanne lankawe kuda aarthikaya mema dawantha aarthikayan samaga eekagra kala wita ema aarthikayanhi athi wi thibena gathikayan lankawa kerehi kelesa balapanu adda yannaya.aarthika bubulu athiwima ha ee aashritha arbuda saha aarthika wishamathawaya thiwra wima sambandhayen eya kelesa balapam karanu adda yannaya.

kingswud widuhal 20n pahala ragar kandayamata panawu wasaraka tharaga thahanama ema kridakayanta pamanak bawath, labana wasare pasal lig tharagawaliyata nawa kandayamak sahabhagi karawimata kingswud widuhalata awasthawa athi bawath pasal ragar sangamaye lekam susantha mendis mahatha ‘dinamina’ta pawasiya.santha anthoni widuhal kandayama samaga pasugiya juni masa bogambara pitiye pawathi tharagaya atharathura kingswud widuhal kridakayan kalahakari lesa hasiremin prathiwadi kridakayanta paharadima sambandhawa pasal ragar sangamaya magin sidukala parikshana warthawata anuwa me thahanama panawiya.edina tharagaya niyojanaya kala kingswud widuhal pile kridakayan 25denama me thahanamata lakwana bawath, mita amatharawa ema tharagaye prathipala shunya kala bawath mendis mahatha kiweya.

nawak muhudu kollakaruwan pahara gaththata passe eeka bera ganna api wenama adhyanayak kala.eeka rahasigatha meheyumak .mama ada kiyanawa puluwannam ada me ka gahana amathilata puluwannam gihin pahara gaththa nawa bera ganna kiyala.habayi mama shri lankikayek .ee nisa mama udaw karanna sudanam .habayi eekatath me aanduwa monawa kiyayida danna .ee nisa rajaya magen likhitha illimak kaloth mama udaw karanna uthsaha karanawa .habayi oya okkoma ka gahapu ayiyalata mama kiyanawa nawika hamudapathi ekka gihin me nawa bera ganna kiyala .ape ranawiruwo danatath innawa thawamath somaliyanu muhude .
eeth ude iskoleta aawe na.ape mala gewalwala shoka prakasha wenuwata sendurange mala gedara beda harune senduran liyala thibunu lipiye chaya pitapath.
ehema eke nawath el.ti.ti.eeya hisa osawanawa kiyala boru pracharaya karanawanam ee ayage wenama nyayak, aramunak thiyenna oona.
kalin kiyapu athuru aabadha me peththa pawichchi karana ayagen 4 n 1 kata aniwaryayen enawa.

“mathiwarana wyaparayak sandaha rajya niladharin ha aarakshaka ansha allagena maragena marena gem ekak denna nawa aandukarawaru path kala kiyalath kiyanawa, nawin disanayaka thaman sathu thorathuru anuwa heshage prashnaya idiriyata thallu kala.

dakkath dinum gahuwath dinum

digu waralasa ayage muhuna thawath sundara karala thibuna.
ee lagata honda kapena pihiyak...

ema wyanjana atharin bahutharaya wiwidha elawalu wargayan.
